page.title: Programs
page.p: There are some programs that are very useful on the command line but are a bit complicated for the quick summary explanation, so here we provide not a complete tutorial on each of them, but enough information to enable both basic usage and the derivation of actual help from the sometimes obscure manpages.
In particular, the goal here is to get you started and then point you in the direction of resources that can explain the full use of the program in question.
